plugins.author: kmarius
plugins.description: Execute actions as requested by the different handlers.
plugins.name: FFmpeg Executor

plugins.author: kmarius
plugins.description: Extracts english subtitles and removes all subtitle streams.
plugins.name: FFmpeg Subtitle Handler

plugins.author: kmarius
plugins.description: Removes metadata from streams and the file itself.
plugins.name: FFmpeg Metadata Handler

plugins.author: kmarius
plugins.description: Add interleaving to MP4 files to improve streamability of the file. Also moves the moov atom to front. Requires MP4Box
plugins.name: Interleave MP4

plugins.author: kmarius
plugins.description: Removes metadata from various audio files.
plugins.name: Audio Metadata Cleaner

plugins.author: kmarius
plugins.description: Run library scans on a daily schedule.
plugins.name: Scheduled Library Scans

plugins.author: kmarius
plugins.description: Transcodes video streams to AVC and reduces excessively large bitrates.
plugins.name: FFmpeg Video Handler

plugins.author: kmarius
plugins.description: Transcodes audio to AAC, removes non-english streams.
plugins.name: FFmpeg Audio Handler
